comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ferdinand_of_Romania Ferdinand succeeded his uncle as King of Romania, on 10 October 1914, reigning until his death on 20 July 1927. He was married to Marie, Queen of Romania. His full name: Ferdinand Viktor Albert Meinrad of Hohenzollern. He was expelled from the Hohenzollern by Kaiser Wilhelm when he entered WWI against Germany.
